website_summaries.verdict: This option stands out for its sturdy look and feel, as well as its impressive array of features.
pros: A large set of features, including multiple light temperature settings, night light, timer, and USB charging port
Metal finish gives it a nice look
Rotates well to illuminate pretty much any area
cons: The touch sensitivity buttons may be a turnoff for some
Quality issues and a high-pitched whine may develop after several months

website_summaries.verdict: A versatile rotating LED desk lamp with multiple functions. Includes a touch control panel for changing the settings and a USB port for charging gadgets.
pros: This LED lamp features five color temperatures and six brightness levels with a convenient night light
Solid build with brushed aluminum body
Memory feature remembers your previous settings
cons: A small amount of users report having received faulty lamps out of the box

customer_reviews.title: Very functional and bright, very bright
customer_reviews.text: This is a great desk lamp. This is a great desk lamp with many brightness settings as well as separate temperature settings. It is VERY bright on its highest setting. There is a very useful favorite button for going back to your favorite light setting. I don't use the night light much button it gives a nice amber light toward the back if it's on your left. like mine. The angle arms are stiff enough to hold the lamp in any position but easy enough to move. It is a good weight so no fear of falling over in any position. I would recommend this to any good friend and even those who are not my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Fotobug

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and versatile—a worthy upgrade from standard desk lamps
customer_reviews.text: This desk lamp is versatile and sleek-looking, unlike standard bulb-based lamps that appear outmoded by comparison. Its multiple color temperatures and brightness settings ensure that you have the light you need for any occasion. The only drawback is that the touch panel attracts fingerprints easily. But, if you want an upgrade to your lighting setup, this is the desk lamp for you.
customer_reviews.author: Foster

customer_reviews.title: Faulty power wire just died
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked to speak with the company but no link! After just 5 months this light just died.Needs a replacement power cord. Seems like it should have lasted longer than this.how can I get a replacement????
customer_reviews.author: writerb14

customer_reviews.title: Want a Haunted Experience? Turns on and off on its own.
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Feels like it has a great frame that is well constructed. Con: It's great if you want to have a haunted house themed room. It started turning itself on and off without any user interaction. It is effectively useless. Most of the time you can't turn it back on. You have to unplug it and plug it back in to get it working.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp.
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp...if it worked properly. Like the style and the features but after a few days the lamp would turn on by its self. Then started turning off on its own then repeatedly off and on. Then it wouldn't go back on until I reset the power supply. Sent email to support but three days later no reply. Returned it
customer_reviews.author: i jason

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp!! Horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: Horrible customer service!! 3 phone calls ,held on 7-10 min. Each Time trying to get Tech info finally hung up without getting Tech info not even responding to emails!
customer_reviews.author: Plaza 400

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is still alive and well
customer_reviews.text: Update: Out of the blue, the company followed up and sent me another lamp. It is working perfectly and I love it! I’m impress with this level of customer service. Plus, the other brand of lamp I got to take its place didn’t hold a candle to this one. PREVIOUS REVIEW.. I had high hopes based the reviews, the lamp's great features and sturdy design. But this is the second of this exact model to die in a very short time. I am very frustrated and disappointed. Update: after a year (by which time I had three broken lamps I couldn’t return), they just sent me a new one!! I’m upping my review—but I’ll be back if it dies again...
customer_reviews.author: GailGSO

customer_reviews.title: Loved this lamp when I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Loved this lamp when I bought it. Nice design, modern look. Nice charger port for my Apple Watch or iPad. Over time (around 6 months) gremlins have started to appear. It now forgets the last color temp I had it on. It also usually shuts off when I touch the top to adjust it. It's just sat on my nightstand, so no idea why things are breaking.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Rock

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp, except for high frequency tone
customer_reviews.text: This lamp has a high frequency whine while using it on any mode other than daylight on full brightness. I hoped it was just a fluke but the second one I ordered has the same issue. It's a shame since this lamp works perfectly otherwise, and the touch controls are pretty responsive (work about 9/10 times). If you don't have good hearing this lamp would be a total recommend, but if you can hear high frequency "whines", I would avoid this one sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Bright light, wish it had more low light levels, my unit would turn on and off by itself.
customer_reviews.text: I received a defective unit. It turns on and off by itself some times. The capacitative buttons some times don't work. Other than that, I probably would have kept the lamp. The lamp gives off a nice diffuse light and is very bright. I like the adjustability of the head. The lamp has a bit of heft to it. A little surprising for its size, but it is made of metal after all. I wish the lowest and second lowest light settings had more levels in between for night time. It seems like there isn't much of a difference between the higher light levels.
customer_reviews.author: Don Q

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent! Love the light and foldable
customer_reviews.text: Awsome light! Money well spent! The light is just everything i hoped with many lighting options positions and its foldable which is perfect for me to fold when I am done with the light at the end of the day as I use it for my Diamond painting art craft it will last a lifetime it even plugs into phone for charging while im doing my art craft.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Chirps - but manufacturer arranged a refund
customer_reviews.text: The power supply chirped - a fast, faint chirping - and I could not leave it plugged in when my daughter was trying to sleep. My daughter and I are both unusually sensitive to faint sounds like that. That makes this lamp inconvenient. I didn't notice and she didn't say anything until Amazon's return period had ended. Beyond that, it's bright and steady and adjustable and all that, but if you notice the small sounds that things make, this could be a problem. Note that my other daughter never noticed the sound. Update: Discussed this with the manufacturer, and they offered a refund directly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like more than expected
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a narrow LED reading lamp for a small side table and this works well. Very attractive industrial modern style is fully adjustable articulating. Light adjusts from low to very bright (my old eyes need lots of light). Includes warm white to daylight range and built-in nightlight, which may be too bright. We got the gold and it looks more champagne. The base includes all the light touch on/off/adjust buttons and is a bit oversized than I'd like but provides great stability for the height and adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: LBK

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, Bright, Very Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I had a small halogen desk lamp with a 2 intensity knob. It's a great little lamp, but simply wasn't bright enough to read textbooks at my desk. This lamp provides hella more light and it has a sliding dimmer (much like an iPhone) as well as a few presets. Super easy to use, very bright, and tall enough to reach over the work space as needed. It is hinged in two places which gives it great flexibility. There is also a nightlight function that keeps a second, smaller light on if you wish. Totally worth the $$ and would defiantly buy again. I might again, actually, for the desk in my music room.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Lamp died just short of a year and a half. Taotronics replaced it promptly, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.text: The light is excellent quality - offering all the wavelengths of light you need throughout the day - and bright. Great design, materials used are nice - and the range of movement is where it needs to be. Only removing one star because of the lamp dying per the review headline. Worked with Taotronics customer support - who promptly responded and had me troubleshoot; to no avail. A replacement lamp was sent very quickly. (Within 7 days). Would buy again; despite the failure of the first lamp. Taotronics is known for quality - and their customer support rectified this properly.
customer_reviews.author: macskills

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk Lamp, USB Port Broke
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp I bought in Feb. 2018 on my desk at work so much, I bought another one for my home office. It gives just the right amount of light to work by, and the angles it can twist into are very helpful (as is the ability to move the bar straight down and out of the way. I also really like the finish on it. Today however, the USB port broke on the original purchase. Fell apart actually, some type of white square disk kind of thing came out when I removed a cord. Now, nothing will stay plugged in. I'm bummed because I use this feature every day. For that I had to knock a star off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this lamp! Works perfect for studying, reading, taking photos (for Instagram 😂), and at night! I mainly use it to study but I could use some night mode here hehe you can also customize your own favorite with different brightness, and can also set a timer! With every penny👍
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Business Desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: After having a failure with another desk lamp, I invested a bit more money on this product. Received it next day as promised, and it is everything its marketing says - sleek looking and attractive; easily-accessible and -usable controls; variety of brightness and "mood" settings, including a great night light feature; very well-made - the adjustable arms are "friction" managed, meaning there are no screws or tighteners that don't tighten properly or strip (as in the other lamp I tried); plenty of range for the arms; perfect brightness from the LED for reading...I wear glasses and need good light...and the LED light is very easy on the eyes. Overall, an excellent product - I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: thinkingreader

customer_reviews.title: Buttons are not very responsive
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this is just a glitch or this is typical of this lamp but the buttons on it were not very responsive. I have to press them like ten times in order to get them to respond. They should have worked with just one press of the button, one touch, and not several times. I have not had the lamp not even a week and already encountered this problem. Other than the buttons not being very responsive to touch, the lighting was good, as described and the USB phone charger worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Takes up very little space.
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it is high enough to cover my desk and not be in my eyes. the sweevil piece is great because it makes it that much more versatile. Weight is no problem. you can put the arm where ever you like and the base will stay where it is. the night light is just right. though don't leave it on when I am asleep. It folds up and out of the way if I want. Like it is not even there. just a slim post on my desk. Very happy that I spent the extra money. There less expensive ones that may do the job. if budget is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Captian

customer_reviews.title: Fully articulating and great looking.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with this product so far. it is fully articulating and not loose, so it holds it's position. It's looking great on the desk. Construction quality is very good with lots of metal . The metal has a brushed look and feel. Excellent. The bottom touchscreen is covered with glass, not plastic. It's an excellent value for money. -The color adjustment works great and it's bright enough for reading. -Touch controls are properly adjusted and work exceptionally well. -The diffuser over the LED's is good. I don't see any hot spots and the light coverage is even.
customer_reviews.author: E!

customer_reviews.title: Light it up!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp to replace one that had a limited direction issue. It is very sturdy ,sleek and the base does not take up a lot of space on my desk. I use it to apply makeup, be able to view my keyboard,and behind my computer when extra lighting is needed for Zoom meetings. No buttons to push, lightly tap indicators on the base to reach preferred brightness. I knew this was what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Msnini

customer_reviews.title: Light quality great- but fells like a chalkboard and is clumsy to move
customer_reviews.text: Like TAO light in general, they are technically great for light quality- this one has all that.First don’t like the surface it feels-little like a chalkboard-unpleasant to touch. 2nd the light arm does NOT rotate right & left which is awkward & needs too much handling.the light arm does not rotate on the base, well tried again & it does -just very stiff. Like the USB - it is fast.Would not buy again would look at other TAO lights ,not other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B. Lautner

customer_reviews.title: Shooting star awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Originally my product became half defective on first use when the USB broke. I continued to use the lamp regardless. Then the lovely Carol from customer service reaches out to me a year later asking if I’d be willing to try a new one. Within days of her email and some short email exchanges the lamp arrived in my mail box. Works great AND the usb didn’t break right away. This is my third lamp and I’d still recommend it to others. The only way you be disappointed is if you didn’t read the full product description of what it does or get a defective lamp. Just buy the lamp, works great.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Don't like the control buttons
customer_reviews.text: The lamp works okay, but I don't like the control buttons at all. All the buttons are touch sensitive without any tactile feedback. Thus you have to look at the buttons in order to press them. And I have to touch them several times before they cause anything to happen. It's very frustrating. I have increased the number of stars to 5 because of customer service. They have reimbursed me for the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Rodger Philips

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a great lamp! I had planned on spending upwards of $200 for a desk lamp. Then, my husband showd me what he was going to order: TaoTronics LED Desk Lamp with USB Charging Port, Eye- care Dimmable Table Lamp, Metal, Glare-Free, 5 Color Temperatures with 5 Brightness Levels, Touch Control, Memory Function-Black. Intrigued, I looked into these, saw how well-reviewed they were and so looked for one that better met my needs, specifically one with a tilting light. I have to say that I love it. Sleek and stylish, and I love all the options, especially the USB port. And you certainly can't beat the price. I'm very pleased and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great for student desk
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this desk lamp. The first went to my grandson for his desk at University. He was thrilled at the amount of light and the ability to change the type of light. Also was really impressed with being able to charge his electronic devices at the same convenient location. The second purchase was a gift to my granddaughter who is just beginning university and is finding the same benefits. It is especially important now that they are taking classes online as well as studying online so the light changes are very beneficial.
customer_reviews.author: Laurelann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, substantial, and ergonomic. Update after using a few days: It appears the touch pad controller is a bit finicky. It is responsive sometimes, takes a while to recognize a touch. It may be hand lotion that is interfering with the touchpad but when I use the touchpad with nothing on my hands (I.e., no lotion) it will respond to my thumb but not any other fingerpad. Will continue to use and post final update. Not sure if I have a bad touchpad or if my fingers are too small or what yet.

customer_reviews.title: The power cable burned out after just a couple of weeks' use—but the seller replaced the cable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these lamps for my house. The one I have in my bedroom just turned off by itself one evening while I was reading. The adapter connected to the plug seemed to have overheated. I tried the power cables from my other 2 lights and they both worked, so it's not the light itself that is faulty, just the power cable. When I brought this to the attention of the seller, they made sure I got a replacement cable, even included an adapter to make sure the cable would fit my lamp. Excellent service!
customer_reviews.author: Adele Booysen

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: It isn't a lot more functional than the cheaper plastic one, though it does have one or two extra tricks, but the brushed metal construction just looks nicer. If you don't care about looks, there is a plastic one that is nice plastic for plastic and will save you some cash. But if you've grown up a bit and you don't want to look like your finished your office out of Ikea and a rental store, this is a good choice. Plenty bright, lots of brightness and color temperature options, and a good looking metal lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Camp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. I’m an artist and have struggled to find something affordable to meet my many needs for working and filming (light tone, brightness, etc) and this one has not disappointed! It is sleek and easy to use. I love that the LED part is cloudy so it doesn’t glare. I almost bought a Dyson task lamp for $300 more, and I’m so glad I tried this instead!! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically and functionally well-designed. 12 Watt Efficent Too.
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of the TaoTronics LED desk lamp: Bright with 5 settings of briteness plus a dim night light setting plus optional 60 mins timer. Kudos for its well-designed aesthetics...could have been designed in Sweden or Denmark. Controls via a touch panel. No clunky switches. Thin lamp head is barely noticeable. Thin, unobtrusive power cord to an AC adapter out of the way on the floor. One USB charge port too 12 watt energy efficient too, and only warm to the touch on the brightest setting. Base is heavy enough doesn't move. Adjustable height, and lamp arm cantilevers to be out of way. Amazed someone didn't make something like this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Paul

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, diffuse lighting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for growing plants on my desktop and I find that it works quite well for this. I enjoy being able to adjust the light angle, color, and brightness easily. I also like that the base is properly weighted so I can extend the arm fairly far out. I cannot extend it to the maximum distance without adding a little more weight to the base but overall this is a good lamp and does exactly what I was looking for. The light output is also very nicely diffused by the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: SeatownDub

customer_reviews.title: Best lamp ever for students!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I will be spending a LOT of time at my desk this semester with everything online. I was tired of the basic old lamp that hurt my eyes and got super hot after a while! So I got this!! It’s AMAZING! No glare on my computer or nursing book pages, the ability to rotate the part with the light as well as the arm is WELL WORTH THE UPGRADE from the other lamp. I got this cheaper because the box was damaged but that was it! Perfect condition!!! It’s amazing and looks so good on my desk!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: I love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a lamp for my piano for some time, and finally found this one. It easily collapses flat, but when I need it, it offers several different colors and brightnesses, and can be pointed right where I need it. I've never found anything else quite like it, and highly recommend it. Quality materials, and very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Westland

customer_reviews.title: The lamp is 12 inches too short for a good effect on desk work, which I corrected by adding height with double stacked metal cup
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of them; and gave one to my son. The sleek design and the quality of light colors are good on my computer desk. One caveat; This lamp will not turn on by turning on the power strip. We must touch the lamp to turn on. Manufacturer can improve it by giving options to the users on it. But, I like the lamp. The lamp is 12 inches too short for a good effect on desk work, which I corrected by adding height with double stacked metal cupboard organizers.
customer_reviews.author: A hiker

customer_reviews.title: Bought 3 of these!!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 kids need a desk lamp. At first I bought one to try and then I purchased 2 more. First of all, the lamp looks very slick and modern. It comes with a USB port which is a big plus to charge a device. The night light that turns off in an hour is great for one of my kid who is scared of the dark. The dimming and the color adjustment is a big plus. My kids loves the lamp that one is going off to college asked for the same lamp. My other kid, wants another one for her side table. I wish they have a taller one for the side table, but this will do.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ely

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this lamp
customer_reviews.text: I got the gold one and it looks great on my wood desk. I love all the light color features from warm to cool, night light etc. Yes, I wish it would be able to go even brighter and I wish I could turn the light part a full 360 degrees to point the light straight up at the ceiling if I wanted but I still really love this lamp. It is beautiful, has tons of features and works great. I have it right next to my computer and I get no interference from it. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: CosyCat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I decided to go with a higher quality lamp because I am studying at home while in college. I am definitely glad I bought this one. Love the different warmth settings and brightness levels. Very sleek and modern design. Also, I love the favorite light setting. Easy to maneuver to change the direction of the light. The night light and 60 minute timer settings are also great features. Also, the lamp purchase included a rechargeable fan which is awesome as well. Highly recommended. I have bought other TaoTronics products because of the satisfaction from this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to My Home Office
customer_reviews.text: A desk lamp is just something I never think about (until our cleaning service broke mine by accident). I did some quick research and luckily found this one. It's like trading in your 2010 vehicle for a 2019 and discovering how much technology has advanced!. I am absolutely impressed with this desk lamp. It looks great in my office and gives me many lighting options (brightness and tint) as well as the angle to project the light. An added bonus was the USB port on the base. Very well built product which will serve me for many years to come. When I upgrade again in 2030, who knows what technology will exist!!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but when bulbs go out they are not replaceable
customer_reviews.text: I love the look. It functions well. Not really that bright for lighting up a room but for desk area it’s plenty. 1200 lumen is like an 80 watt incandescent bulb. The adjustment angles and controls do a lot with that light. I use it at full strength for lighting up a office desk in a room with poor lighting. If I am close I aim the light to the wall. It rotates and swivels a lot of angles , around base, high/low, and swivels. It came with cloth to wipe off fingerprints on control screen. I had it about half a year when I wrote this.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Jopinion

customer_reviews.title: Love it. . . and the company!
customer_reviews.text: I have two positives to share. The first is that the lamp is incredible. It was just what I needed for my desk. The white color light options, the style and small footprint, the weight balance, the charging port. . . best desk light I have owned - until the bulb went out after 22 months. That was disappointing. But Sunvalley Brands read my review and took the initiative to correct the problem by sending me a new replacement desk lamp. In my book, the only thing better than a great product is great customer support and service, and Sunvalley Brands offers both! So I am a very satisfied customer! 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Lechler

customer_reviews.title: ... the lamp too long yet but I am very happy with my purchase so far
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the lamp too long yet but I am very happy with my purchase so far. It's gives good light to my desk work space and the controls function well. Plus the USB charging port is handy and worked fine for charging my iPhone. The adjustability of the light arm's position makes it quite practical to focus the light where you want it. It is solidly made and, although it costs twice as much as most of the plastic versions, the metal construction makes the appearance much more elegant. So overall I'm quite happy with the lamp. It works well and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Jake G.

customer_reviews.title: Magnificent Lighting!
customer_reviews.text: Illuminating! Truly a great lamp. It has a nice sleek, stylish-but not “too” modern; absolutely love the color and will probably fit perfectly in just about any design style (home or office). The color modes and the USB charging port are a nice touch, however, more importantly, the brightness levels are excellent. If you are looking for a smart “modish” lamp that has quality lighting and decent pricing, this is definitely an option I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SimplyMe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a while for a nicely made slim desk lamp with a long reach, but finding only cheap stuff at stores. This lamp is very attractive and sturdy. The elbow hinges stay put, but it can be adjusted or easily moved to put as much light as you want exactly where you want it. The 4 or 5 brightness levels and color adjustments are great too. There other other features, such as night light and auto off timer, which I haven't even used yet.
customer_reviews.author: rjk

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: It looks even nicer than the pictures. Light is very adjustable for both color and brightness. I can't imagine wanting it any brighter than the top setting. Lots of nice touches, like a USB port in the base. I love how sturdy it is. The only small drawback is that it takes two hands to rotate the neck: one hand to hold down the base and the other to actually perform the rotation. However, I only need to do this once in a great while, so not a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Peter F. Ash

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of this lamp, and the fact that there isn't a manual switch to wear out or bulbs that need to be replaced. I only wish it was a little brighter like the one that it is replacing, but it is still bright enough. A really nice feature is the ability to twist the top of the lamp a little bit to prevent the light from glaring against my computer screen. Unfortunately, when I do that it blinds my wife when she sits across from me. Still working on ways around this.
customer_reviews.author: RVS053063

customer_reviews.title: Best Desk Lamp EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I did not know how much I was suffering with my old desk lamp. I placed the new TaeTronics TT-DL16 on my desk, plugged it in, turned it on and BAM!!! DAYLIGHT!!! Oh my.... I was not expecting the level of light offered by this lamp. AWESOME AWESOME AWESOME!!!! Plus, it is exceptionally well built! Fit and finish is excellent! This is one of the few items I have ever ordered that has exceeded my expectations in every way! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell W. Riggins

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, versatile, and stylish light
customer_reviews.text: I used this to replace another LED touch light on my night table. The design is sleek and stylish, with good quality construction. The rotating base and articulated hinges let you get it in just the right position, and it stays put. The base is very stable, and the USB charging function is a nice plus. The controls are very intuitive, and provide a range of light temperature which varies from a warm mood hue, right through to a bluish-white color that is excellent for reading. Topped off with variable brightness, a night light, and a sleep timer. This is really a great light. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: ComputerBastard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lighting for Different Needs
customer_reviews.text: I did thorough research on desk lamps prior to purchasing two of these. I got the perfect lamp for my needs. I would buy a third if I needed another lamp. Whether I need a bright light to see something or dim light as I work on the computer, this lamp does the job. I originally purchased two, but I most certainly would purchase more. The USB charging port is just an added bonus and makes it convenient to keep my mouse charged. (The power charger, also sold by Sunvalley, in the photo is RavPower 60W 6 port usb , works great also.)
customer_reviews.author: robomacman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Functional
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and functional. The ability to adjust from cooler to warmer tones makes an enormous difference. I typically use cooler tones throughout the day to compliment the natural daylight and warmer tones at night, as those seem to be easier on my eyes. As some other reviewers have noted, the base joint is rather difficult to maneuver, however, I think this was intentional so as to avoid having to readjust after every slight bump. My only concern is the responsiveness of the touchpad. It appears to be rather finicky at times, though certainly not to the extent that I have any intention of returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Stylish with good color choices
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish lamp that does what it advertises: three different color temperatures, the neutral white being what I needed for viewing photo prints to compare to my editing screen. The arm reaches out far enough to cover larger photos. I just wish the light would bend up a bit more, but it has a stiff arrangement that only allows it to protrude out, while bending down, by design.
customer_reviews.author: Jurgen LobertTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised
customer_reviews.text: The name isn't "well known" except for being on Amazon. I've ordered "small" stuff from them before and this was the first "major" buy. I ordered two desk lamps for my boys to use during school zoom meetings. After opening the box and taking them out....I want one of my own! They have a heavy base to keep it in place and the lighting adjustments are numerous. It has a quality feel, not cheap! The feel like they were built to last. If I could justify more desk lights, I would buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Tabernacle

customer_reviews.title: I purchased two of these I like it so much.  :)
customer_reviews.text: Nicely finished desk lamp. Metal construction gives enough weight to base to allow are to extend out more without toppling lamp over. This is an advantage over the plastic version. Gives a nice, diffuse light (vs. point source), so more area is illuminated. Can change the color temperature from warm to "white", depending on your mood. Lots of brightness levels, and also a "save favorite" feature. I typically leave use it on low setting, warm at night when, say, watching a movie in bed, and use my "favorite" setting (brightest, white light) when reading. I purchased two of these I like it so much. :)
customer_reviews.author: J. Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Expenisve disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The range of motion and degrees of lighting are nice. The lamp is solid and well made. However, the power indication light is ALWAYS ON! Which is a problem if you want this on your nightstand. I do not want a bright little LED blasting away next to my head while I'm trying to sleep. Such a bummer. Sure, maybe a piece of tape could cover it or some other crude and inelegant solution. I didn't spend this much money on a cool lamp to have it marred by a piece of electrical tape! This is the second time that TaoTronics has let me down.
customer_reviews.author: BBOWES

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Lamp arrived well packaged, it is very sturdy, and very bright. The only thing is, it turns on and off at will. It is not reliable. I'm sorry I missed my return window or I would have sent it back. CORRECTION The company contacted me and offered to replace the lamp even though I was past the return time. The new lamp works perfectly! I just love it. It is very bright and helps me to see clearly while I am painting. Great company to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Kathleen Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Great looks at a great cost
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for 2 desk lamps and was not wanting to spend $400.00/each and then found these on Amazon. These are great modern looking lamps that can move in any direction, are heavily weighted to not tumble over and have a wide range of brightness capabilities and all of this for much less than $400.00/each. They look great on the desks and easily light up or not with the touch of a finger. Very highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: waynjer64

customer_reviews.title: Nice light
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and I really like it. It has a nice weight to it and the finish is well done. The light can be very bright if you need a worklight and you can dim it down and modify the color to suit your requirements. What I didn't ask or realize is that you cannot turn it on and off with a wall switch. If you do it loses all power and settings. I will make due with hitting the button. Other than that, I wish they would use biodegradable packaging inside the box the light comes in. Foam packaging is so bad for the planet.
customer_reviews.author: G. Robinette

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this lamp
customer_reviews.text: My brother has macular degeneration and his eye doc suggested this lamp to help him read because it simulates sunlight. It is such an amazing lamp that I bought one myself. There are many dimming choices, easy-to-navigate controls, and myriad positions into which it can be easily adjusted.The craftsmanship is superb. I am an editor and am at my computer much of the day. I never considered how a lamp like this could so improve my working conditions, but it does. I highly recommend it. There is a handy night as well. The price is very affordable, especially considering the battery is said to last 15 years! I am buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Narda

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressive
customer_reviews.text: After hunting for some time for a good desk lamp, I finally located this one. Though a bit more expensive than most other models, I felt that the difference in price and materials may make a difference... It did! Not only is this lamp large enough to light up any standard workstation, but its movements are smooth and supple. The controls work very well and the adjustable light is used more often than I thought it would be. You can wake up to this lamp without temporary blindness. Consider this model over TaoTronics' other models, this is what you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Kragen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love this desk lamp. Thee metal material is premium and the touch controls are fantastic. The USB charger on the side is a big plus. I like my workspace to be fairly dark as I spend most of my time staring at a computer screen. This lamp lets me adjust the brightness to the best level for what I'm doing. It also allows you to change the color (or temperature) of the light which is a big plus. Warm light for ambient light and bright white when I need to work on something up close. Will be purchasing a new one to go into my work office.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable engineering
customer_reviews.text: The most expensive of the desk lamps offered on the Amazon web site, I ordered the Taotronics TT-D16 desk lamp . It arrived promptly and my wife and I have been truly amazed by the product. It was packaged beautifully: easy to remove, a cinch to open, set up and immediately plug in and operate. The instruction manual (a rarity these days) was written in lucid English.The lamp has an array of options from night light to multi-tinted, easily adjusted low to extra bright light--all easily accessed and intuitively touch controlled. AN OUTSTANDING PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: StuR

customer_reviews.title: Very solidly built
customer_reviews.text: I like the solid, precision construction. I don't like the brightness of the power button even when the lamp is off. I chose to use it on my nightstand by my bed and even when everything is off, the light from the power icon illuminates quite brightly. That said, it is meant to be an office lamp and that should be a non-issue in an office setting. It is nice to change the temperature settings of the light to match with room ambience or the latest book I am reading. I would purchase 2-3 more of these but they are priced on the high side. That said, they are well made.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Hiesterman

customer_reviews.title: Fully satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for my old LED table lamp which was not very bright. This lamp is very bright. I also wanted a lamp that can be higher than my monitor. At 18 inch height, this just fits the bill. There is a night/bedtime reading mode with warm light on the side. This is not useful for me, but might be for others. The lamp is well built. The controls are easy to see. Hope this lamp will last a few years.
customer_reviews.author: MN Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking and high quality lamp; but, not quite as tall as I would like.
customer_reviews.text: I failed to read the specifications carefully enough and the lamp needed to be elevated for my large desk working area. I do calligraphy work. At my personal desk, I put it on an 8" high platform for better coverage. When I complained about this shortcoming, the company responded immediately offering to give me an exchange or refund in an effort to satisfy me. One can't complain about this kind of customer support today (thus, the top rating). I decided to keep the lamp as is; and, am glad that I did. It is also ideal, as a bedside reading lamp. Greg G.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp!!
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp!! Works perfectly at my desk for editing photos. Delivery on the other hand is skeptical. This the 2nd day a product was delivered to me without it being boxed, it’s the original box on my porch being advertised what it is. If this is Amazons new procedure I’ll be changing things up. No customer should have their products sitting on the porch advertising what actually is in box.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile desklamp with many useful features & great styling
customer_reviews.text: I now own three TaoTronics TT-DL16 desklamps; one of which is my primary desklamp, the other 2 are on bedside tables. The intensity (brightness) and temperature (color mode) variations are particularly useful and I utilize the "Nightlight" function and USB Charging Ports nightly. Superior design and craftsmanship with two (2) articulating joints (one near the base and one that controls the angle of the head unit) that allow proper placement of lighting. Appearance is more like a metal sculpture than a common desklamp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable brightness and adjustable viewing angles
customer_reviews.text: This lamp has it all. Turns on by pressing a spot on the base of the lamp. Gives off a bright light for reading and a softer light for other things. Brightness is adjustable. The light is totally adjustable with the arm able to be positioned in two different ways and the light itself twisted to any angle you want. Has a nightlight function, too. Plus, it's a handsome accessory to your desk or wherever. The light supposedly lasts a lifetime, so no more unscrewing and screwing in light bulbs of any kind. Very happy with this onetime purchase that will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Dave 68

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but perfect desk lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the versatility of this lamp. The different lighting settings for brightness and color hue are great. Even better are the endless possibilities to move the light exactly where you need it. The light is metal and has a solid feel to it. I’m hopeful to be using this light for many years at my desk when I’m working before the crack of dawn.
customer_reviews.author: Nhwhazup

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and useful
customer_reviews.text: This is really a lovely desk lamp. (Note: I only received it today, so this is a first impressions review.) It has 5 levels of color temperature, and several levels of brightness. The arm articulates at two points and swivels 360 degrees at the base. It has a USB charger, which I haven't tried yet. The base is heavy and stable, and the lamp is mostly metal. There are some plastic parts, such as the control area in the base, but it certainly looks and feels like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Paul in SF

customer_reviews.title: Bright, flexible, adjustable lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lamp. Good features (there are more, but these I like best): --Bright. I don't use it on its brightest setting. --It has a memory both of how it was last set and your default setting. Very easy to use and not overcomplicated --Has a USB port on the side -- Has a tiny nightlight that you can leave on. --Lighting is very even. Not quite perfect: --The illumination comes from an oblong panel 2" * 5.5". The metal edges of these could have been chamfered a little more. They're quite sharp. But not something you're going to touch.
customer_reviews.author: John L

customer_reviews.title: A very good, if not exceptional table/reading light
customer_reviews.text: My impressions: Sleek, elegant modern design, well built and thought, functional, mechanically and functionally flexible and well priced. The night light feature is one I would have opted out, but I now have a use for it. Gray color matches darker wood stains like I have. Finish is very nice brushed metal. Reliability unknown, but it is a function of time. This is about 7 months after purchase: Everything is good, but the on/off switch on both lamps is getting a little difficult to activate.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp. Perfect for a college student who needs to adjust the brightness or color of the light. Easily can brighten up the room or be set on a dim sleep mode. Awesome product! I love that there are multiple settings not only for brightness, but the shade of the light. Typically at night I will use the warmer toned shade to reduce the strain on my eyes during late night studying.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Davis

customer_reviews.title: You won't find a better desk lamp. At ANY price!
customer_reviews.text: Exquisite piece of merchandise. No surprise there. I've purchased TaoTronics products (humidifiers) before this and was duly impressed with the quality and technological prowess. In fact, when I saw this same company with a lamp for sale, I didn't hesitate to place the order. I couldn't be more satisfied. Their quality control and innovation, not only makes for outstanding consumer products, but I'm wondering if this company might make a good investment in one's portfolio. This is no ordinary player. Their products are leaps ahead of their competitors!
customer_reviews.author: B. Wire

customer_reviews.title: Nicest lamp I've purchased, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Best lamp I've purchased. Beautifully made from aluminum to give a nice finish and stable weight. The touch controls just add to its simplistic beauty, offering a multitude of dimming and reading modes. The nightlight mode is by far my son's favorite, and with the added ability to rotate the luminary part of the upper arm 180 degrees in each direction, you can easily direct the light to where you need, or don't need it. This lamp could only be made better by integrating a time, date, temperature display into the base or arm.
customer_reviews.author: Stew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Office or Home Office!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best LED desk lamp I've ever used. It floods my entire work area with uniform light. Top shelf materials and construction, with widely adjustable color temperatures and brightness levels to suit every application. The separate night light section is a nice touch too. NOTE: this is a DESK lamp. It was designed to assist in doing serious work under proper lighting conditions. It is NOT a nightstand light for your bedroom. If you want a lamp for your bedside nightstand, look for something smaller.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sacremento

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but the cover does not work welL to me
customer_reviews.text: I read the review was very good. This product is overall good, with bright lights, flexible adjustments and multi angel placement. My problem with this lamp is if I flip the lighting surface toward me, it’s too bright and hurt my eyes, if I flip it toward my monitor, it has a big glare. I wish the neck is taller and the cover could be extended a little bit so it’s not too bright and light up my designated area. Anyway, it’s a great product if it fits your need!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: A must have for an office desk
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed and easy to use desk lamp. All features designed with office ergonomics in mind. The dim features is great. The soft and cold white feature is helping a lot during the day and night/dark hours when working at the desk. One feature that can be added is a vertical telescopic extension. Many monitors are higher than the lamp and I was looking to install it just above the monitors. (compensate that with 2 books ;) ). Other that that - 5 starts.
customer_reviews.author: Savelie Badanau

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Desl Lamp for me
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this desk lamp. It meets all my requirements. PROs - very nice looking with modern style in brushed aluminum finish - very functional, with multiple adjustments for brightness (up to 1200 Lux) and color modes (2700K to 6500K) - has timer and night modes - very sturdy on my desk - has one USB port (not used yet) - power supply supports 110v - 240V (US plug) CONs - the base is a little large (5 1/4 by 7 1/4 inches))
customer_reviews.author: Bob Ford

customer_reviews.title: Worlds best desk lamp.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this light is so good it is off the charts ! Even the packaging it arrives in is so superior. On par with the way Apple packages it products. When I get time I shall inquire to see what else this company builds. I assure you - it will dazzle you with design ahead of its time. Oh, for the record, I am not easily impressed. These folk have their “stuff” together. And I can now get rid of my present fluorescent desk lamp. Into the trash with it.
customer_reviews.author: kent lacey

customer_reviews.title: I had envisioned easily moving the lamp as needed but find I must ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptionally attractive light that is very impressionable on anyone's desk. All brushed metal that is a standout. The functionality is impaired by the way the lamp rotates on the base. I had envisioned easily moving the lamp as needed but find I must firmly hold the base while applying very firm pressure to the lamp extension in order to re-direct the light. This is very annoying and difficult with a desk covered with paper work. I have notified the company concerning this but have had no response. If this lamp would easily rotate as advertised it would be a 5 star item. Because of this design flaw I would not order again.
customer_reviews.author: atag

customer_reviews.title: Great looking lamp
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised how much I like looking at this lamp. It's not a style I would ordinarily buy but, I needed a better reading light and the reviews about this lamp are "great" so... I went agsainst my "style" and I couldn't be happier. The functions of the light buttons are a snap (or a swipe) to use and the different gradients of light quality are a very good feature of this lamp. What we have here is a really good looking Lamp with really good choices of lighting to suit your needs.
customer_reviews.author: AMG

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lamp overall
customer_reviews.text: This LED lamp has good brightness, color adjustment and other features that set it above much of the competition. The brightness selector can be adjusted to all settings without toggling through all of the possibilities (+1 star). The auto shut off timer at first seemed like something I didn't need, but have come to like a lot (plus another star). It can be twisted and adjusted to almost any position. The only downside is the price, but considering the other offers it is worth the extra in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Ancient DIY'er

customer_reviews.title: WELL Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: It's worth the price. This lamp comes in handy when Im working on intricate projects at my desk for school, or even need to move it into the living room to work there. It even has a orange light AND blue light setting for those of us that need orange lights to help us sleep at night. The health mode seems to mimic sunlight which has been extremely helpful for my energy levels having dealing with the artificial lights of my house during lock-down. With 6 LED brightness modes and a night light mode for ambiance I feel like this lamp pays for itself.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, solid and adaptable desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with this LED desk lamp. The style really fits with my office. Functionally, the lamp can be manipulated into a variety of positions, offering the best possible illumination for the task. I’m also very pleased with the quality of the build on this product. It’s really a solid lamp. I really like the ability to change the color temperature of the light. I honestly didn’t think I’d use that feature, but it really makes a difference. I use the warmer tones at night when I’m looking at mail, printed stuff, and colder temperatures during the day while working on a computer. You will be very please with this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Montagna

customer_reviews.title: Great lite.  Looks better than in the pictures
customer_reviews.text: This light is a little pricey, but that is my only gripe. Provides plenty of light. You can't really tell by the pictures, but the light is very attractive. It will look good on any desk Swivel plus 3 articulation points make it easy to get light where you need it. I like the night light feature, though some will find it useless. I don't find the color temperature adjustment useful. I don't.
customer_reviews.author: ainsworth

customer_reviews.title: This is our second one...
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these desk lamps for my office about a year ago, and I liked it so much that we got a second one for my wife's art studio, and she loves it. The brightness is adjustable. The color of the light is adjustable. It supposedly has a timer, but we have no use for a timer and cannot attest to this particular functionality. Build quality appears very good and I've nod no trouble with mine for the past year. Knock wood -- or metal in this case.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Richard Hauptmann

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, with 2 concerns.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice and sturdy light, however, I noticed a few concerns. 1. The LED (Yellow light) starts flickering after 15~20+ min of use as the LED heats up. Not so much in White light mode though 2. The Aluminum Neck / Arm of the light is very sharp, product would've been better if this was touched up a bit before sending to the customers' hands. Aside from this, I am a very happy customer, for it's reasonable price, minimalistic build, compact design for easy packing, and it can go very bright!
customer_reviews.author: Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Charger is worthless
customer_reviews.text: It really is a great desklamp. looks and feels good and solid and works very well. i was really hoping to also use it to charge my Samsung Note 8 phone. Unfortunately, without me even using my phone at all and just sitting connected to the 2Amp charging USB port, my phone still slowly decreases it's battery level. doesn't even maintain a charge for me. It it wasn't for that this would be a 5 star item.
customer_reviews.author: dylan foster

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic LED desk lamp with myriad lighting options.
customer_reviews.text: Completely happy with this LED lamp. It has a USB plug on the side for charging a phone, etc. The lighting levels can be adjusted in myriad combinations. There are also settings for reading, coffee (relaxing), full brightness, etc. The user may also program in a "favorite" setting. There is also a "night" setting where the unit turns off, but a small LED stays lit on the side. This makes it very easy to find the lamp in a dark room.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Desk Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect? Absolutely. Why? Highly adjustable position and angle of light, even beautiful light that you can customize to your preferences. Highly blue light can give me headaches like florescents. This lamp lets me adjust the temperature from cool to warm at just my preference. During the day I use a whiter light, while at night I use a warmer light. The custom setting is great so I can always get back to my preferred settings of temperature and brightness. It is also beautifully manufactured with the brushed metal skin and glass touch controls. Amazing quality for the money. I will definitely buy more products from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Alfieri

customer_reviews.title: Emitted a Humming Sound but the Company Fixed it
customer_reviews.text: Yes it does, even when off. We thought we heard bugs making a noise. It turned out to be the light, we have two of them. Both emit an annoying humming sounds, even when off. When we unplugged it, voila, sound went away. Update: The company did fix it and replaced both lamps with two other lamps, and the problem is gone. Good service.
customer_reviews.author: Bigmac

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Light!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. When I unpacked it I was struck by how well it was packed and the quality of the packaging materials. The light is just as good. Quality materials, attractive design, and a very pleasant light output. It is very easy to adjust the light output to get just what you want. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this light! The base is heavy enough that it doesn’t fall over. It has plenty of positions and I love that the light shines only where you want it! I sometimes need to be close to the lamp for a project and it doesn’t blind me but still lights up the desires area as bright as I want it. Great lamp and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Andy K.

customer_reviews.title: Review by IXO of TaoTronics TT-DL16
customer_reviews.text: The gentleman who did this review does an excellent in the video review. He was very descriptive and accurate about the lamp and I purchased it because of his review. When I got the lamp it was everything as described and I am very impressed by the lamp. The quality and looks are great! It is reviews like this that allow consumers to purchase products sight unseen with confidence! Great job!
customer_reviews.author: denlars

customer_reviews.title: Good work light
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this based on reviews and have found it a useful addition to my workbench. I like the variable brightness although I use it at max most of the time. I have played with all the functions including the dimmer, color adjustment, nightlight, etc. and found it to be quite versatile. My biggest recommendation comes from the fact that it reduces my eye strain when working on repair projects.
customer_reviews.author: Matt-Man

customer_reviews.title: Not your old man's desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: Thank God. Traded in a beautiful stainless steel halogen desk lamp for this computerized replacement. Couldn't be happier. Lamp has many more options. It's attractive as long as you ignore the row of backlit icons on the base. I'm sure it consumes a fraction of the energy of the old lamp. A definite upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is stylish and well made. The controls are easy to work and accessible. The only thing I do not like is that the USB port puts out only a trickle of power. I tried charging my tablet with it and in 10 hours it was only able to increase the battery power from 5% to 20%. At that rate it would take several days to charge the device. I was so let down, this is a beautiful lamp with sophisticated controls and style but they can't make a good USB port?
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Replacement lamp works much better.
customer_reviews.text: The 1st lamp I purchased lasted only 6 months and then became dimmer and dimmer and dimmer. When I sent in the review, the company actually sent me a new lamp which has been working perfectly fine. I do like the style of the lamp and the flexibility as well as the ability to do or brighten the light depending on my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie

customer_reviews.title: Great desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: The controls are all in front, in a cluster, and with enough separation that you tend to tap the right button. Good lighting, with bright white for reading and paperwork, and soft red/orange for night time when working on a computer. Decent weight and sturdy joints gives it a solid feel. Looks good ... I got the gold version.
customer_reviews.author: M.R.T.

product_meta.title: TaoTronics Stylish Metal LED Desk Lamp, Office Light with 5V/2A USB Port, 5 Color Modes, 6 Brightness Levels, Touch Control, Timer, Night Light, Philips Enabled Licensing Program (Grey)
product_meta.description:
Color:Iron GrayTaoTronics - Enhance Your Life Enjoy life to the fullest with TaoTronics.

From industry-leading LED lighting solutions to home goods and audio devices, we put users at the center of our decisions and design products that address life’s needs and help you make the most of your daily activities. 
Technical Specifications:

Operating Voltage: DC 12V / 2A

Lumens: 600 lm

USB Port: 5V/2A
Power Voltage: 100V-240V

Full Range CCT: 2700K-6500K
What's in the Box:

1 x TaoTronics Desk Lamp (Model: TT-DL16)

1 x Power Adapter

1 x User Guide
feature_bullets: Durable & Solid: Made of premium aluminum alloy, the LED desk lamp is thoughtfully designed, stylish and scratch-resistant to last longer
More Colors, Much Brighter: 5 color modes and 6 brightness levels meet your needs for any occasion; up to 1200 Lux, the lighting is bright enough for reading, studying, working, relaxing, etc.
More Colors, Much Brighter: 5 color modes and 6 brightness levels meet your needs for any occasion; up to 1200 Lux, the lighting is bright enough for reading, studying, working, relaxing, etc.
Personalize Your Light: Easily dim or brighten the light, or drastically change the color through a scale of warm yellow to cool white by sliding your finger on the glass touch pad
More Features: Conveniently powers up your device via the 5V/2A smart USB port; shine a spotlight in any angle you want by swiveling the lamp via the 4-axis rotation up/down/left/right

specifications.Special Features: Touch Dimmer, Modern Design, Memory Function, No Glare Reflects on Screen, USB Charging Port, Dimmable, Philips EnabLED Licensing Program, 5V/2A iSmart USB port, memory function, 60-minute timer, night light
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars3,320 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
